languages.text: {n}Улыбка Вистенцы гаснет как свеча на ветру.{/n} "Вы... вы не посмеете... дело всей моей жизни... {n}Губернатор сжимает кулаки, но тут же берет себя в руки. Ее улыбка почти неотличима от искренней.{/n} "Что ж. Даже блеклая жизнь лучше яркой погибели. Обещаю, что найду себе новое... развлечение".

traits.locale_text: {n}Улыбка Вистенцы гаснет как свеча на ветру.{/n} "Вы... вы не посмеете... дело всей моей жизни... {n}Губернатор сжимает кулаки, но тут же берет себя в руки. Ее улыбка почти неотличима от искренней.{/n} "Что ж. Даже блеклая жизнь лучше яркой погибели. Обещаю, что найду себе новое... развлечение".

languages.text: {n}Vistenza's smile is extinguished like a candle in the wind.{/n} "You... you wouldn't dare... it's my life's work..." {n}The governor balls up her fists, before mastering herself. Her smile is almost perfect in its imitation of sincerity.{/n} "Well. Even a wan life is better than a vibrant death. I promise to find a new... pastime for myself."

languages.text: {n}维丝坦萨的笑容仿佛风中残烛一样熄灭了。{/n}“您……您怎么能……这可是我毕生的心血……”{n}总督捏紧了拳头，才慢慢地恢复了知觉。她笑了笑，笑容看起来几乎充满真诚。{/n}“好吧，即便是惨淡地活着，也比充满活力地赴死要好。我保证会为自己找个新的……消遣方式。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza's smile is extinguished like a candle in the wind.{/n} "You... you wouldn't dare... it's my life's work..." {n}The governor balls up her fists, before mastering herself. Her smile is almost perfect in its imitation of sincerity.{/n} "Well. Even a wan life is better than a vibrant death. I promise to find a new... pastime for myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}维丝坦萨的笑容仿佛风中残烛一样熄灭了。{/n}“您……您怎么能……这可是我毕生的心血……”{n}总督捏紧了拳头，才慢慢地恢复了知觉。她笑了笑，笑容看起来几乎充满真诚。{/n}“好吧，即便是惨淡地活着，也比充满活力地赴死要好。我保证会为自己找个新的……消遣方式。”

languages.text: {n}La sonrisa de Vistenza se extingue como una vela en una tormenta.{/n} «No... No se atrevería... es el trabajo de toda una vida...». {n}La gobernadora aprieta los puños antes de contenerse. La imitación que su sonrisa hace de la sinceridad es prácticamente perfecta.{/n} «En fin. Incluso una vida tediosa es mejor que una muerte emocionante. Prometo buscar una nueva... afición».
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza's smile is extinguished like a candle in the wind.{/n} "You... you wouldn't dare... it's my life's work..." {n}The governor balls up her fists, before mastering herself. Her smile is almost perfect in its imitation of sincerity.{/n} "Well. Even a wan life is better than a vibrant death. I promise to find a new... pastime for myself."

La imitación que su sonrisa hace de la sinceridad es prácticamente perfecta.{/n} «En fin. Incluso una vida tediosa es mejor que una muerte emocionante. Prometo buscar una nueva... afición».

languages.text: {n}ヴィステンツァの笑みは風前の灯火だ。{/n}「そんな…私の生涯をかけた仕事を…お認めになるつもりはないと…」{n}総督は自制できずに拳を握りしめる。誠実そうに見せかけた、ほぼ完璧な笑顔だ。{/n}「そうですね。弱者として生きるとしても、華々しく死ぬよりマシというものです。お約束しましょう、新しい…娯楽を自力で探すと」
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza's smile is extinguished like a candle in the wind.{/n} "You... you wouldn't dare... it's my life's work..." {n}The governor balls up her fists, before mastering herself. Her smile is almost perfect in its imitation of sincerity.{/n} "Well. Even a wan life is better than a vibrant death. I promise to find a new... pastime for myself."

languages.text: {n}Vistenzas Lächeln verlöscht wie eine Kerze im Wind.{/n} "Das ... würdet Ihr nicht wagen ... es ist mein Lebenswerk ..." {n}Die Gouverneurin ballt die Fäuste und bringt sich dann wieder unter Kontrolle. Ihr Lächeln ist in seiner Imitation von Aufrichtigkeit nahezu perfekt.{/n} "Nun ... selbst ein müdes Leben ist besser als ein furioser Tod. Ich verspreche, dass ich mir eine neue ... Freizeitbeschäftigung suche."
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza's smile is extinguished like a candle in the wind.{/n} "You... you wouldn't dare... it's my life's work..." {n}The governor balls up her fists, before mastering herself. Her smile is almost perfect in its imitation of sincerity.{/n} "Well. Even a wan life is better than a vibrant death. I promise to find a new... pastime for myself."

Ihr Lächeln ist in seiner Imitation von Aufrichtigkeit nahezu perfekt.{/n} "Nun ... selbst ein müdes Leben ist besser als ein furioser Tod. Ich verspreche, dass ich mir eine neue ... Freizeitbeschäftigung suche."

languages.text: {n}Le sourire de Vistenza s'éteint comme une bougie dans le vent.{/n} « Vous... Vous n'oseriez tout de même pas... C'est l'œuvre de toute ma vie... » {n}Elle serre les poings, puis se reprend et affiche un sourire qui semble presque sincère.{/n} « Ma foi, même une vie insipide vaut mieux qu'une mort spectaculaire. Je promets de me trouver un nouveau... passe-temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vistenza's smile is extinguished like a candle in the wind.{/n} "You... you wouldn't dare... it's my life's work..." {n}The governor balls up her fists, before mastering herself. Her smile is almost perfect in its imitation of sincerity.{/n} "Well. Even a wan life is better than a vibrant death. I promise to find a new... pastime for myself."

C'est l'œuvre de toute ma vie... » {n}Elle serre les poings, puis se reprend et affiche un sourire qui semble presque sincère.{/n} « Ma foi, même une vie insipide vaut mieux qu'une mort spectaculaire. Je promets de me trouver un nouveau... passe-temps. »

languages.text: {n}Vistenza'nın neşesi, rüzgârda bir yaprak gibi uçup gidiyor.{/n} "Siz... Yapmayın... Hayatımı adadım..." {n}Vali, önce bir yumruklarını sıksa da kendine hâkim oluyor. Bilmesen gülüşünün samimiyetine kanabilirsin.{/n} "Peki... Bitik bir hayat bile coşkun bir ölüme yeğdir. Kendime yeni bir... Meşgale bulacağıma söz veriyorum."

Her smile is almost perfect in its imitation of sincerity.{/n} "Well. Even a wan life is better than a vibrant death. I promise to find a new... pastime for myself."
